name: Ghost of Ukraine
description:
After enabling or disabling touch control - NEED TO START A NEW GAME

control:

arrow - move

spc - open door

z - switch gun

x - shoot

c - grenade

hello friends, I am a beginner developer, this is my first game, I was inspired to create it by aggression against my country.

I will be very grateful for your comments.

   Thanks for support!
